text: I’m now that guy who rings up tech support, is told to “turn it off and on again” and it fixes my problem…
The keyboard & trackpad have not been working on my MacBook for the past few days, not a major issue as I use bluetooth ones when at the office
Tried PRAM reset but as the keyboard didn’t work, that obviously didn’t work!
Been trying to get Genius bar appt, rang them up this morning and they said to try with the bluetooth keyboard
Now we all *know* that you can’t do a PRAM reset with a bluetooth keyboard, because *obviously* bluetooth etc haven’t started up and had enough time to connect by then
2 minutes later I feel stupid, but have a fully working machine again!
